data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Supaul, Bihar, India so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Supaul, Bihar, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the county of Supaul. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Supaul, Bihar, India that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Supaul, Bihar, India. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Brahmin people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Brahmin people.
Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Supaul access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Supaul, Bihar, India.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Supaul, Bihar, India.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

location.name: Supaul
location.people_groups_list: Bania Barnawar, Mukeri, Dhanuk, Laheri (Muslim traditions), Bania Sinduria
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Bania Barnawar (65,000), Mukeri (32,000), Dhanuk (4,203,000), Laheri (Muslim traditions) (56,000), Bania Sinduria (26,000)
